mapper.insert: insert into member(MNO, MNAME, MPW, MBIRTH, MPHONE, MEMAIL, MADDRESS, MJOINDATE, MQUITDATE, MQUITREASON, MSTATE, MDAYOFF, DNO, PNO ) values(seq_member.nextval, #{mname}, #{mpw}, #{mbirth}, #{mphone}, #{memail}, #{maddress}, #{mjoindate}, NULL, NULL, 1, 11, #{dno}, #{pno})
mapper.select: select M.MNO, M.MNAME, D.DNAME, P.PNAME, M.MBIRTH, M.MJOINDATE, M.MEMAIL, M.MPHONE, M.MADDRESS from MEMBER M join DEPARTMENT D on M.DNO = D.DNO join POSITION P on M.PNO = P.PNO
select MNAME, MBIRTH, MPHONE, MEMAIL, MADDRESS, MQUITDATE, MQUITREASON, MSTATE, MDAYOFF, DNO, PNO from MEMBER where mno=#{mno}
